channel.title: treasure on Obed's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in treasure on Obed's Blog

item.title: We will not hide them!
item.description: We will not hide them from their children, Telling to the generation to come the praises of the Lord, An His strength and His wonderful works that He has done. Psalm 78:4

item.title: Who has made man's mouth?
item.description: It has been a while that I promised I’d submit a daily bible treasure. This is a time for new resolutions and to make it happen. I’m planning to share some extracts from my daily bible reading. I trying my best to post something at least once a week. I wish that The Lord bless you with all this.

item.title: Introduccion a 'Tesoro Semanal'
item.description: Este es un inicio de algo que quiero emprender. Un mensaje semanal de lo que estoy aprendiendo al estar estudiando la palabra de Dios. El propósito es compartir lo que Dios me permite aprender cada día.
